name: SONADA UNITED TRIBAL WELFARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: As the name suggests. this society works for the welfare of the tribals of Darjeeling hills especially in the rural belts and tea gardens. The society has served the tribal students by helping them to get scholarships and stipends from the government as well as facilitating for them coaching for competitive exams provided by the government. The society has also helped the buddhist tribals in securing minority scholarships from the government.The society  has also worked for the tribal women by helping them to form self help groups (shgs). The society has also made the tribal populace avail the various loan schemes for tribals from the government. This society ia also the member of Federation of Societies for Environmental Protection.
